content: Hoarfrost is one of the many Transformation Spells you can obtain in Black Myth: Wukong. Upon using it, you can transform into a Monk from the Sea, weaving strikes with a blizzard's grace and launching attacks that inflict Frost Bane. Any focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterwards, too.

The content is as follows:
Hoarfrost is one of the many Transformation Spells you can obtain in Black Myth: Wukong. Upon using it, you can transform into a Monk from the Sea, weaving strikes with a blizzard's grace and launching attacks that inflict Frost Bane. Any focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterwards, too.
